Text:
Hey darkpawt,

You know that you're allowed to get better at this don't you?

ie: Better quality capping, encoding with XviD, etc, etc...

This is your eleventh go at it.

Thanks darkpawt for getting us these extremely rare and unaired (in the US) episodes of Tripping the Rift.

And Harry Q, if you don't like what darkpawt is kind enough to provide, cap the episodes yourself.
And if my encodes were this bad I'd shoot myself.
